languages.text: "Ты лжешь. Вы не способны выжить и защититься от Хаоса, не полагаясь на страдания других".
"You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."
languages.original_text: "Ты лжешь. Вы не способны выжить и защититься от Хаоса, не полагаясь на страдания других".

traits.locale_text: "You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."
"You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."
"You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."
"You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."

languages.text: «Mientes. Los Drukhari no pueden sobrevivir y escapar de la atracción del Caos sin alimentarse del sufrimiento ajeno».
languages.original_text: "You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."

traits.locale_text: «Mientes. Los Drukhari no pueden sobrevivir y escapar de la atracción del Caos sin alimentarse del sufrimiento ajeno».

languages.text: “你在说谎。黑暗灵族只能靠他人的痛苦为生，否则根本无法生存，也无法逃离混沌的魔掌。”
languages.original_text: "You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."

traits.locale_text: “你在说谎。黑暗灵族只能靠他人的痛苦为生，否则根本无法生存，也无法逃离混沌的魔掌。”

languages.text: 「嘘だな。デュカーリは他人の苦しみを糧にする以外に、渾沌の誘惑から逃れて生き残ることはできない」
languages.original_text: "You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."

traits.locale_text: 「嘘だな。デュカーリは他人の苦しみを糧にする以外に、渾沌の誘惑から逃れて生き残ることはできない」

languages.text: « Vous mentez. La vérité, c'est que les Drukharis seraient bien incapables de survivre et de résister à la force d'attraction du Chaos sans se nourrir de la souffrance des autres. »
languages.original_text: "You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."

traits.locale_text: « Vous mentez. La vérité, c'est que les Drukharis seraient bien incapables de survivre et de résister à la force d'attraction du Chaos sans se nourrir de la souffrance des autres. »

languages.text: "Ihr lügt. Drukhari können nur überleben und sich der Anziehungskraft des Chaos entziehen, indem sie sich an dem Leid anderer laben."
languages.original_text: "You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr lügt. Drukhari können nur überleben und sich der Anziehungskraft des Chaos entziehen, indem sie sich an dem Leid anderer laben."

languages.text: "Yalan. Drukhariler, başkasının ızdırabıyla beslenmedikçe Kaos'un pençesinden kaçamıyor da ondan."
languages.original_text: "You lie. Drukhari cannot survive and escape the pull of Chaos except by feeding off the suffering of others."

traits.locale_text: "Yalan. Drukhariler, başkasının ızdırabıyla beslenmedikçe Kaos'un pençesinden kaçamıyor da ondan."
